text: Nickels for Your Nightmares is the fourth album by the Canadian rock band Headstones. The album featured the hit singles "Settle" and "Blonde and Blue", which reached #4 and #8 on Canada's Rock chart, respectively. By June 2000, the album had sold 30,000 copies. ==Track listing== ==Chart Performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Chart (2000) !Peak position |- |- |} ==References== Category:2000 albums Category:Headstones (band) albums Category:MCA Records albums
title: Nickels for Your Nightmares
